person.persName: John J. Ellis (Jefferson County, KY, grocer & flour dealer)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, chairmaker, grocer, and wholesale flour dealer. New York native. Married to Sarah Ann Leatherman Ellis in Jefferson County on May 16, 1849. Father of Sarah E. “Libbie” Ellis, Josephine “Josie” A. Ellis, Ida May Ellis, Dixie D. Ellis, and Lee Ellis. Chairmaker in Columbus, Ohio, in 1850. Grocer in Louisville in 1860. Signed a petition as a wholesale flour dealer in May 1861 to appoint W. G. Timberlake as flour inspector.
